Trophy.Title: In the Books
Trophy.Description: Earn all of the MLB® 13 The Show™ Trophies.

Trophy.Title: Escape Artist
Trophy.Description: As the pitcher, escape from a no out, bases loaded jam without any of the runners scoring (only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Payback Time
Trophy.Description: After getting hit by a pitch, hit a home run on that player's following at-bat (only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Bringing the Heat
Trophy.Description: Earn a save by throwing all fastballs (one and two-out saves don't qualify; only earned if playing an uninterrupted 9-inning game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Dreaded Leadoff Walk
Trophy.Description: Draw a walk with the first hitter of an inning (only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Average Boost
Trophy.Description: Get 5 hits in a single game, with a single player (only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Disrespected
Trophy.Description: Hit a home run immediately after an intentional walk (only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: 2-Out Rally
Trophy.Description: Score 3 or more runs after the first two batters of an inning made outs (not achievable in RTTS; only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Quick Thinking
Trophy.Description: Pull off a successful 1-2-3 double play (not achievable in RTTS; only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Small Ball
Trophy.Description: With a runner on second and/or third with no outs, hit a ground out to the right side of the field that advances the runner(s) (only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Brand New Ballgame
Trophy.Description: Tie the score after being down by 4 runs in a game (not achievable in RTTS; only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Didn't Even Break a Sweat
Trophy.Description: Have your starting pitcher throw a complete game with 58 or fewer pitches thrown (only earned if playing an uninterrupted 9-inning game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Worm Killer
Trophy.Description: As the pitcher, induce 15 or more ground outs in a single game (only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Strike ‘Em Out, Throw ‘Em Out
Trophy.Description: Turn a double play by striking out the batter and throwing out the runner stealing (not achievable in RTTS; only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Piling On
Trophy.Description: In a single game, score 20 or more runs (not achievable in RTTS; only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Number 17
Trophy.Description: In a single game, hit 4 or more home runs with the same player (not achievable in Home Run Derby™; only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Winning Combo
Trophy.Description: Throw a combined no-hitter with 2 or more pitchers (not achievable in RTTS; only earned if playing an uninterrupted 9-inning game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Credit Extension
Trophy.Description: In Citi Field™ (NYM), have a player hit for the cycle (only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Bang the Drum
Trophy.Description: In Turner Field™ (ATL), hit a home run to center field that hits the bongo drum (on the fly).

Trophy.Title: So Close, Yet...
Trophy.Description: In Oriole Park (BAL), hit the scoreboard in right field (on the fly, in fair territory).

Trophy.Title: Brewed Fresh
Trophy.Description: In Miller Park™ (MIL), hit a home run in the stands to the right of the center field hitter's eye (on the fly).

Trophy.Title: Bronx Bomber
Trophy.Description: In Yankee Stadium™ (NYY), hit a home run into the second deck of the right field stands (excludes classic stadiums).

Trophy.Title: Arr, Matey!
Trophy.Description: In PNC Park™ (PIT), hit a home run that hits the PIRATES hedge in center field (on the fly).

Trophy.Title: Land Ho!
Trophy.Description: In Safeco Field™ (SEA), hit a home run into the bullpens in left-center that lands on dirt.

Trophy.Title: Hail to the Chief
Trophy.Description: In Nationals Park™ (WAS), hit a home run off the right field foul pole.

Trophy.Title: Latest and Greatest
Trophy.Description: Complete a The Show™ Live game (only earned if playing an uninterrupted 9-inning game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: First Person
Trophy.Description: In Road to the Show, catch a fly ball using the new Manual Catch feature.

Trophy.Title: Fall Ball
Trophy.Description: Complete a Postseason Mode game (only earned if playing an uninterrupted 9-inning game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Derby King
Trophy.Description: Win an Online Home Run Derby™ contest.

Trophy.Title: First Steps
Trophy.Description: Advance to Beginner Hitting Rank 2 (not achievable in Practice or Training modes; only earned if playing an uninterrupted game against the CPU, without switching sides or fast forwarding).

Trophy.Title: Going Green
Trophy.Description: Use the Card Recycler in Diamond Dynasty.
